file_content.text: Safe journey.
No outsider has ever returned to us.
What you have seen is personal. We do not ask.
You are one of us. You may enter our chambers in the Shrine of Healing. There you will find your ritual.
Now, what do I owe you? I hate to leave any outstanding debts.
What about the boon?
Patience.
Thank you.
We did nothing.
So how do I learn this mind-healing ritual?
Tell me what to expect.
When you reach the shrine, present this insignia.
You will learn the ritual of mind-healing. We will collect the boon when we need.
I once again offer my appreciation.
Thank you again.
Just try.
You cannot prevent it.
May your journey lead to truth.
You will collect nothing.
No you won't. [Kill him.]
Aggghhh!
Speak to Fadith-Ki. The trip is an ordeal. When you reach the shrine, present this insignia.
Meditate. Dream. Return.
Greetings, friends. I seek a ritual to silence the ghosts in my mind. Can you help?
An outsider? We get few visitors.
You want the ritual of mind-healing. It is hidden. Only our order know it.
If you'll allow it, I'd like to join your order.
Then we must join forces.
Surely you can make an exception.
Is there no hope?
Our traditions are dictated by truth; there are no exceptions.
Teach me the ritual or I will kill you all.
Don't make me hurt you.
Calm. We are not your enemies.
You could join our order. It is not forbidden.
Your mind is fragmented. You may not survive the initiation.
If this is what it takes to learn the ritual, I embrace the risk.
I will do what I must.
We are sorry if this kills you.
What does this "initiation" entail?
Initiation?
I am a Lord of the Sith. There's nothing I fear.
You don't frighten me.
Not even yourself? That is what you will face.
Take this seed. Burn it in the cavern. Breathe its fumes. Meditate. Follow the dream.
That is the first part. The second is a boon that you pay us, we choose when.
I am indebted to you already, for your help.
Fair enough.
What is a boon, exactly?
Boon?
A small debt.
I don't like the sound of that.
This can't be good.
Trust is necessary.
Dream-walking binds your consciousness to ours. There is no choice.
Here is the seed. Safe journey.
Busy. Sorry.
